entry.title: Meet the Anu₿itux project
entry.summary: Anu₿itux is a free project that aims to provide to everyone a safe and secure enviroment to manage crypto-stuff like wallets, seeds, transactions, etc, in a secure and simple way. The Anu₿itux distro comes also with a lot of cool tutorials that will show how…
entry.content:
Anu₿itux is a free project that aims to provide to everyone a safe and secure enviroment to manage crypto-stuff like wallets, seeds, transactions, etc, in a secure and simple way. The Anu₿itux distro comes also with a lot of cool tutorials that will show how to use the included tools or how to approach with cryptos minimizing risks.

Stay tuned with following our Telegram channel, to receive notifications every time a new releas or a new tutorial comes out.

The project is carried out by:

MisterSerious

pinco pallino

Suggestions and comments can be sent to the Anu₿itux team members or writing an e-mail to info@add_a_mail.org.

If you appreciate this work and want to contribute, donations are appreciated!

BTC: 1AnUbiYpuFsGrc1JFxFCh5K9tXFd1BXPgb

entry.title: Download Anu₿itux
entry.summary: DISCLAIMER!!! Anu₿itux is a free project that aims to provide a secure and safe enviroment to use cryptocurrencies, also showing some use cases and tutorials. All the tools included have been downloaded from trusted sources like officilal ubuntu repositories, github and official websites. Althought no…
entry.content:
DISCLAIMER!!!

Anu₿itux is a free project that aims to provide a secure and safe enviroment to use cryptocurrencies, also showing some use cases and tutorials. All the tools included have been downloaded from trusted sources like officilal ubuntu repositories, github and official websites.

Althought no guarantee is provided with it. User is always supposed to do only things he knows and to manage sensible information and backups himself.

The Anu₿itux team takes no responsibility about malfunctioning tools or about unsafe usage of its solutions and its tutorials.

Download links:
